entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High zero.
